name: Derelict Dungeons
description:
A rogue-like game. Progress through a set of 8 randomly generated dungeons. Fight the monsters waiting within the dungeon rooms. Fight a boss at the end of each dungeon. Find secrets and items along the way. These might come in handy.

It is recommended to play with controller for best experience.

[VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT]

I work on this project in my free time. Currently there is only the first 'level' prototype. A lot of features and polish is missing. For example, sound/music, bosses, level design and secrets.
